questionTitle: You don't look well. You ____ see a doctor. (Advice)
____ lending me your CD player for a couple of days? (Request)
Whose book is this? - I am not sure. It ____ be Ann's. (Possibility)
She ____ home yesterday because her little son was sick. (Necessity)
Though he was ill and weak, he ____ get out of the burning building. (Ability)
The windows look clean. You ____ wash them. (Absence of necessity)
You ____ disturb him during his work! (Prohibition)
Whose car is this? - It ____ be Anton's. I think I saw him driving a red car like this one. (Strong probability)
I don't believe it. It ____ be true. (Impossibility)
